text: To Live Again is a 1963 short documentary film produced by Mel London. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==See also== *List of American films of 1963 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1963 films Category:1963 documentary films Category:1963 short films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films
title: To Live Again (film)
